description:
A do-it-all shirt for free range living. The performance-knit fabric wicks sweat and moves with you for comfort in a range of temperatures. Soft, cotton like fabric has permanent odour control that's welcome when you're hitching into a trail-side town. Awesome for cross-country hiking and any hot-weather activity.

  • 100% polyester spun jersey with HeiQ® Fresh durable odor control
  • Heathered fabric is 50% recycled content. Striped fabric is 76% recycled content
  • Raglan sleeves with underarm gussets for chafe-free comfort and range of motion
  • Droptail hem adds coverage
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Trail Long-Sleeved Shirt - Women's
